answers.answer: Wud they do my csection b4 ddte?

If it doesn't lower and baby seems in danger, they'll probably deliver a few days early. They prlly just want to monitor everything for a day or two first before deciding though since you're only a week away
They are probably going to just monitor you to make sure your bp goes down and there are no more contractions, but I'm just taking a guess I'm not quite sure. BTW GL!!!! :)

Thnks ladies, I'm hoping to c my bby soon so I ws hoping seein tht I'm here, they'll do the op a lil earlier bt yes my bp needs to gt undercntrl :))) wtever they gave me an injection in my butt is mkn me pretty sleepy
I also notice some swelling in my hands an feet I never hd this b4 y nw? An bp hs never bn high?
Swelling and high bp are signs of preclampcia (sp) your in the best place so wouldn't worry. Your already classed as full term just they try to let you go as far as possible.

They did draw some blood ths mrnin, I jus dnt c the point if I'm bein releasd after recoverin an comin bck in two days or so to deliver, nt sayin thts the case as I hvnt spkn to the doc yet, bt I'm jus wrkn out scenarios in my head,lol, wt is preclamsia?

That is EXACTLY what they did with my first pregnancy, they called me that morning cause my Dr woke up in the night worried about me. I came in that afternoon (I was getting married to my now exhusband lol so they let us wait til after we were done celebrating) my BP was through the roof, they admitted me for a 48 BP and urine watch (for protein) my BP just kept getting higher and higher and he said my kidneys were failing, they hooked me up to a monitor for baby and found his heartbeat was very low which they said meant he was in some distress. So they came in 48 hrs later and said "Doing the C-Section tonight around 6!" I was only 36 weeks so mine was an emergency. For your little bundle comes now they'll be just fine :) I wouldn't worry too much you're far enough along there shouldn't be any complications! Good luck girly!!

PS I was gonna say it sounds like preeclampsia which can be bad but its very common. That's what I had, it was awful with my first and with my second I didn't have it at all with this one I've only shown beginning signs and.only within the last week or so.
I think ur gonna hav a baby 2day!

Wow Mrsandefur, you went thru quite an ordeal, I lukd at myslf nw in the mirror an I luk like crap my face is abit puffy, nose is even more swollen, I thnk wt they waitin for is to clear the flu completely, I reali dnt care wt they do as lng as my bbys healthy, hd a physiotherapy session nw, wow tht ws painful somone slappn u on the bck, bt afterwrds you gt ths weird vibrating thng tht massages ur whle bck wntd to cry it ws so gud, gttn somone to rub ur bck. Wud any of ths affect the bby? I'm curious

question: Today I hd serious contractions in my bck tht wer 15mins apart they seemd to hv stopped after two hrs, I'm 38wks nw so I've bn admitted again, due to my bp bein 160/90, r they admittin me for my bp bein high as my average is nrmlly 125, my csection is scheduled for the 14th which is bout 7days frm nw, could they possibly do it earlier? Or wt I'm jus worried hvnt spkn to my doc yt an nurses r nrmlly so vague wen one asks questions, I've bn put on a iv
title: bck in hospital....
